Shaniwarwada

Ameya Karve

I am a graduate of IIT Madras with degrees in Engineering Design and Biomedical Design. I write a lot of code. I like to travel around, and will do anything for good food. I watch a lot of football and play a little too. I am also interested in architecture, linguistics and cities among other things. You can follow me on Twitter at @ameyakarve or write to me at ameyakarve [at] gmail [dot] com . You can look at some of my code on my Github.
